    [Programmers] 5. 완주하지 못한 선수 (javascript)

    Date: 2022.12.20    Updated: 2023.02.12

    Categories: programmers

    Tags: javascript, recursive, study

    Index 

    //시간 초과
function solution(participant, completion) {
  let hashMap = new Map();

  for (let i = 0; i < participant.length; i++) {
    hashMap.set(i, participant[i]);
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < completion.length; i++) {
    for (let [key, value] of hashMap) {
      if (completion[i] === value) {
        hashMap.delete(key);
        break; //중복 방지
      }
    }
  }
  // console.log(hashMap)
  return hashMap.values().next().value;
}
